titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to require the consideration of a standard requiring electric utilities to offer community solar programs to ratepayers.
Establishment of Community Solar Programs Act of 2021
Establishment of Community Solar Programs Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Establishment of Community Solar Programs Act of 2021
This bill requires states and certain nonregulated electric utilities to consider standards concerning the deployment of community solar projects.
